code: import React from'react';import{Box,SimpleGrid,Text,Spinner,Center,Button,VStack}from'@chakra-ui/react';import MatchCard from'./MatchCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MatchList=_ref=>{let{matches,isLoading,onRefresh,onMatchClick,color="blue.500",showPremiumBadge=false}=_ref;if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Center,{py:10,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{spacing:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Spinner,{size:"lg",color:color}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{color:"gray.500",children:"Loading matches..."})]})});}if(matches.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Center,{py:10,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{spacing:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{color:"gray.500",fontSize:"lg",children:"No matches found"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:onRefresh,colorScheme:"blue",variant:"outline",children:"Refresh"})]})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SimpleGrid,{columns:{base:1,md:2,lg:3},spacing:4,children:matches.map(match=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MatchCard,{match:match,onClick:()=>onMatchClick(match.id)},match.id))})});};export default MatchList;
